scripts.build: yarn workspace @hmcts/postgres-prisma run collate && mkdir -p prisma && cp ../../libs/postgres-prisma/dist/schema.prisma prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate: yarn build && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:dev: yarn build && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:reset: yarn build && npx prisma migrate reset --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
